content:
HttpContextBase Class

Definition

Serves as the base class for classes that contain HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.

In this Article

public abstract class HttpContextBase : IServiceProvider
Inheritance
System.Object
HttpContextBase

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The HttpContextBase class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the HttpContext class. The HttpContextBase class enables you to create derived classes that are like the HttpContext class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing.

The HttpContextWrapper class derives from the HttpContextBase class. The HttpContextWrapper class serves as a wrapper for the HttpContext class. At run time, you typically use an instance of the HttpContextWrapper class to call members on the HttpContext object.

Constructors

HttpContextBase()

Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

protected HttpContextBase ();

Properties

AllErrors

When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of errors (if any) that accumulated when an HTTP request was being processed.

public virtual Exception[] AllErrors { get; }
Value
Exception[]

An array of Exception objects for the current HTTP request, or null if no errors accumulated during the HTTP request processing.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Application

When overridden in a derived class, gets the HttpApplicationState object for the current HTTP request.

public virtual System.Web.HttpApplicationStateBase Application { get; }
Value
HttpApplicationStateBase

The application state object for the current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ApplicationInstance

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the HttpApplication object for the current HTTP request.

public virtual System.Web.HttpApplication ApplicationInstance { get; set; }
Value
HttpApplication

The object for the current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Cache

When overridden in a derived class, gets the Cache object for the current application domain.

public virtual System.Web.Caching.Cache Cache { get; }
Value
Cache

The cache for the current application domain.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

CurrentHandler

When overridden in a derived class, gets the IHttpHandler object that represents the handler that is currently executing.

public virtual System.Web.IHttpHandler CurrentHandler { get; }
Value
IHttpHandler

An object that represents the currently executing handler.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

CurrentNotification

When overridden in a derived class, gets a RequestNotification value that indicates the HttpApplication event that is currently processing.

public virtual System.Web.RequestNotification CurrentNotification { get; }
Value
RequestNotification

One of the RequestNotification values.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Error

When overridden in a derived class, gets the first error (if any) that accumulated when an HTTP request was being processed.

public virtual Exception Error { get; }
Value
Exception

The first exception for the current HTTP request/response process, or null if no errors accumulated during the HTTP request processing.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Handler

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the IHttpHandler object that is responsible for processing the HTTP request.

public virtual System.Web.IHttpHandler Handler { get; set; }
Value
IHttpHandler

The object that is responsible for processing the HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

IsCustomErrorEnabled

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether custom errors are enabled for the current HTTP request.

public virtual bool IsCustomErrorEnabled { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

IsDebuggingEnabled

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the current HTTP request is in debug mode.

public virtual bool IsDebuggingEnabled { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the request is in debug mode; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

IsPostNotification

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether an HttpApplication event has finished processing.

public virtual bool IsPostNotification { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the event has finished processing; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Items

When overridden in a derived class, gets a key/value collection that can be used to organize and share data between a module and a handler during an HTTP request.

public virtual System.Collections.IDictionary Items { get; }
Value
IDictionary

A key/value collection that provides access to an individual value in the collection by using a specified key.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

PreviousHandler

When overridden in a derived class, gets the IHttpHandler object for the parent handler.

public virtual System.Web.IHttpHandler PreviousHandler { get; }
Value
IHttpHandler

An IHttpHandler object that represents the parent handler, or null if no parent handler was found.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Profile

When overridden in a derived class, gets the ProfileBase object for the current user profile.

public virtual System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase Profile { get; }
Value
ProfileBase

If the profile properties are defined in the application configuration file and profiles are enabled for the application, an object that represents the current user profile; otherwise, null.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Request

When overridden in a derived class, gets the HttpRequest object for the current HTTP request.

public virtual System.Web.HttpRequestBase Request { get; }
Value
HttpRequestBase

The current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Response

When overridden in a derived class, gets the HttpResponse object for the current HTTP response.

public virtual System.Web.HttpResponseBase Response { get; }
Value
HttpResponseBase

The current HTTP response.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Server

When overridden in a derived class, gets the HttpServerUtility object that provides methods that are used when Web requests are being processed.

public virtual System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase Server { get; }
Value
HttpServerUtilityBase

The server utility object for the current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Session

When overridden in a derived class, gets the HttpSessionState object for the current HTTP request.

public virtual System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase Session { get; }
Value
HttpSessionStateBase

The session-state object for the current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

SkipAuthorization

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that specifies whether the UrlAuthorizationModule object should skip the authorization check for the current request.

public virtual bool SkipAuthorization { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if UrlAuthorizationModule should skip the authorization check; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Timestamp

When overridden in a derived class, gets the initial timestamp of the current HTTP request.

public virtual DateTime Timestamp { get; }
Value
DateTime

The timestamp of the current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Trace

When overridden in a derived class, gets the TraceContext object for the current HTTP response.

public virtual System.Web.TraceContext Trace { get; }
Value
TraceContext

The trace object for the current HTTP response.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

User

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets security information for the current HTTP request.

public virtual System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal User { get; set; }
Value
IPrincipal

An object that contains security information for the current HTTP request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

AddError(Exception)

When overridden in a derived class, adds an exception to the exception collection for the current HTTP request.

public virtual void AddError (Exception errorInfo);
errorInfo
Exception

The exception to add to the exception collection.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ClearError()

When overridden in a derived class, clears all errors for the current HTTP request.

public virtual void ClearError ();
Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

GetGlobalResourceObject(String,String)

When overridden in a derived class, gets an application-level resource object based on the specified stem.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey* and stem.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey* properties.

String

resourceKey
String

Always.

NotImplementedException

Returns

RewritePath(String)

When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path.

public virtual void RewritePath (string path);
path
String

The replacement path.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

RewritePath(String,Boolean)

When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path and a value that specifies whether the virtual path for server resources is modified.

public virtual void RewritePath (string path, bool rebaseClientPath);
path
String

The replacement path.

rebaseClientPath
Boolean

true to reset the virtual path; false to keep the virtual path unchanged.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

RewritePath(String,String,String)

When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path, path information, and query string information.

public virtual void RewritePath (string filePath, string pathInfo, string queryString);
filePath
String

The replacement path.

pathInfo
String

Additional path information for a resource.

queryString
String

The request query string.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

RewritePath(String,String,String,Boolean)

When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path, path information, query string information, and a value that specifies whether the client file path is set to the rewrite path.

public virtual void RewritePath (string filePath, string pathInfo, string queryString, bool setClientFilePath);
filePath
String

The replacement path.

pathInfo
String

Additional path information for a resource.

queryString
String

The request query string.

setClientFilePath
Boolean

true to set the file path used for client resources to the value of the filePath parameter; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.
